name: 2025 the 13th International Conference on Industrial Technology and Management
content: Publication: Accepted papers with proper registration and presentation will be published in below listed journals collection. Papers will be sent for indexing services. IJEETC: International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications Indexing: Scopus (since 2017), Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. IJMERR: International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research Indexing: Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. JAIT: Journal of Advances in Information Technology Indexing: ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, CNKI, etc. IJIMT: International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology Indexing: Google Scholar, CNKI, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library JOAMS: Journal of Advanced Management Science Indexing: CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref
